install_app:
You need to install the Lists app on your device first.
Click here to get to the Garmin ConnectIQ Store.

device_state.AppNotInstalled: The app is not installed on this device
device_state.InvalidState: The device is in an invalid state
device_state.NotConnected: No connection could be established with the device
device_state.NotPaired: The device is not paired with Garmin Connect
